sentences.en: An infection had spread from his gums, irreparable harm.
sentences.cn: 从牙龈向全身扩散的病毒对他造成了无法医治的伤害.

sentences.en: And he is crushed by this irreparable discovery.
sentences.cn: 在这个已是无以挽回的发现面前,他崩溃了.
因为天性已经使之不可救药.

sentences.en: Extensive mining will cause irreparable damage to the area.
sentences.cn: 大量采矿会对该地区造成无法弥补的损害。

sentences.en: Her death is an irreparable loss to the firm.
sentences.cn: 她的去世对公司是不可弥补的损失.

sentences.en: If he would only sit down quickly the failure might not be irreparable.
sentences.cn: 如果他赶快坐下来,失败可能远不至于无可挽回.

sentences.en: Incidents of this type cause irreparable damage to relations with the community.
sentences.cn: 这类事件会对与该社群的关系造成不可弥合的伤害。

sentences.en: Irreparable problem is the destruction of the natural system.
sentences.cn: 乔?巴斯奎特:对自然系统的破坏是最棘手问题.

sentences.en: It'suffers from an inherent and irreparable weakness.
sentences.cn: 它有着固有的,无法弥补的弱点.

sentences.en: Now I genuinely believe that we could suffer irreparable damage.
sentences.cn: 现在我认为,我们可能遭受无法弥补的损失.

sentences.en: The death of Mother Teresa is an irreparable loss to the destitute.
sentences.cn: 德兰修女逝世是赤贫人们无可弥补的损失.

sentences.en: The flood did irreparable damage to the Building.
sentences.cn: 洪水对这幢楼房的损坏是无法弥补的.

sentences.en: The flood did irreparable damage to the house.
sentences.cn: 洪水对房子的损坏无法弥补.

sentences.en: The move would cause irreparable harm to the organization.
sentences.cn: 这一举措会对该组织造成不可弥补的损害。

sentences.en: The wild boar ploughs the earth up like a furrow, and does irreparable damage in the cultivated lands.
sentences.cn: 这只公野猪把土翻得像犁沟似的, 给这些耕地造成了不可弥补的损失.

sentences.en: This thing, if continued, will do us irreparable damage.
sentences.cn: 这情况如果继续下去, 会给我们造成无可挽回的损失.

words.tran_cn: 不能替代的，不能调换的
不能繁殖的；不能再现的；不能复制的
不能恢复地；不能挽回地
不能挽回的；不能修补的

trans.tran_cn: 不能修复的，不可弥补的，不能挽回的，无可补救
trans.tran_en: irreparable damage, harm etc is so bad that it can never be repaired or made better
